Audiobook.Title: The End of History and the Last Man
Audiobook.Author: Francis Fukuyama
Audiobook.PlaybackInstructions: To play this audiobook, use apps that support .m4b files, such as VLC Media Player (Windows/Mac/Android), Apple Books (iOS/macOS), or Smart Audiobook Player (Android).
Audiobook.Notes: This audiobook is freely available and contains no DRM. The .m4b format supports chapters and bookmarking. Download directly from the URL above.
